If you see a pony, all is well!

To view alt-text and emote name, tap on the emote.
Note that this usually won't work in areas where tapping the text does another action.

If you don't know all the emote names off the top of your head, you can use DinsFire's PonyMote app to search and copy the names to your clipboard.

You can also enable a shortcut in the settings that lets you search for emotes via the copy/cut/paste menu. This very likely won't work in OEM skinned ROMs, so it is disabled by default.

Note that this will not work in apps that either
1: hide the emote text (most reddit apps) and
2: are not using android APIs (text in web browsers or games).

I'm working on getting some reddit apps to add an option to disable hiding emotes and will update this as they adopt it.

By default, emotes are marked to be removed in some cases (such as email clients or text currently being edited) to maximize compatibility. This can be deactivated in the settings if you don't plan on emailing an emote anytime soon.
A reboot is required to take effect.
